work_experiences.title: Data Scientist
work_experiences.description: Building AI implementation infrastructure for a 50,000+ person institution. Leading AI adoption strategy, agent development, and data warehouse modernization at the intersection of AI strategy, data engineering, and organizational change.
key_achievements: Led Copilot Premium rollout and governance framework for enterprise-wide AI adoption
Built AI agents for research summarization, donor correspondence, and report analysis using Claude and Microsoft 365 Copilot
Migrated data warehouse from on-premise SQL Server to Databricks with semantic layer design
Developed governance frameworks for responsible AI usage across the institution
metrics: Managed AI tool adoption across 50,000+ person institution
Led Copilot Premium implementation for enterprise users

work_experiences.title: Data Scientist
work_experiences.description: Applied data science and analytics to advancement operations, building predictive models and data-driven strategies for fundraising and donor engagement.
key_achievements: Built propensity models for donor identification and audience segmentation
Developed analytics pipelines for fundraising performance tracking
Applied NLP techniques to donor communications analysis

work_experiences.title: Director of Prospect Research
work_experiences.description: Led a team of 3 in prospect research and data analytics for conservation fundraising. Director-level management with cross-functional collaboration across the organization.
key_achievements: Managed team of 3 prospect research analysts
Developed data-driven prospect identification and cultivation strategies
Built analytics frameworks for conservation fundraising campaigns

work_experiences.title: Prospect Research Analyst
work_experiences.description: Data analytics and prospect research in university advancement, transitioning into data science with R programming and predictive modeling.
key_achievements: Presented at DRIVE 2017 conference with outstanding audience reviews
Built R-based analytics tools for fundraising analysis
Developed predictive models for donor identification

work_experiences.title: Prospect Research Analyst
work_experiences.description: Prospect research and analytics for higher education fundraising, beginning the transition from librarianship to data-driven roles.
key_achievements: Developed prospect research processes for the advancement office
Created data analysis workflows for donor identification

work_experiences.title: Research Associate
work_experiences.description: Research and data analysis supporting fundraising operations for nonprofit housing organization. Entry point into prospect research from a non-traditional background in public relations, librarianship, and teaching.
key_achievements: Supported fundraising operations with data research and analysis
Built foundation in nonprofit data analytics

projects.name: Beacon
projects.description: AI-powered job search platform that curates AI-first companies with evidence-backed scoring, automated career page scanning, job relevance scoring, and LLM-powered application materials generation.
outcomes: Automated career page scanning with relevance scoring
LLM-powered resume and cover letter generation

projects.name: AI Agent Development
projects.description: Building AI agents for research summarization, donor correspondence, and report analysis using Claude and Microsoft 365 Copilot. Deploying agentic workflows for non-technical users in higher education.
outcomes: Agents deployed for research summarization and donor correspondence
Declarative agents built for non-technical end users
Governance framework developed for responsible AI agent usage

projects.name: Data Warehouse Modernization
projects.description: Migration from on-premise SQL Server to Databricks, including semantic layer design, governance frameworks, and modern data engineering practices.
outcomes: Designed semantic layers for unified data access
Built governance frameworks for data warehouse operations
Modernized ETL pipelines from legacy SQL Server to Databricks

projects.name: Copilot Premium Rollout
projects.description: Enterprise-wide implementation of Microsoft Copilot Premium across a 50,000+ person institution, including governance frameworks, training, and adoption strategy.
outcomes: Governance framework for enterprise AI tool adoption
Training materials and adoption strategy for 50,000+ users
Established policies for responsible AI usage

publications_talks.title: DRIVE 2017 Conference Presentations
publications_talks.description: Conference presentations on fundraising analytics with outstanding audience reviews. Demonstrated data science applications in prospect research and development analytics.
